title: NRG Player Carbo Skin
description:
Modern Carbo theme for NRG Player - free music player with equalizer, plays songs from folders and customizable user interface.
▶ Features
•  Classic NRG control wheel
•  Customizable color theme
•  Album art on the main screen, widgets and lock-screen
▶ Installation
•  Install NRG Player version 1.1.6d or greater
•  Launch NRG Player Carbo Skin
•  Tap “Launch NRG Player” button
or
•  Open NRG Player Settings
•  Open “Look and feel” screen
•  Tap on “Skins” item and select “Carbo” skin
description_html:
Modern Carbo theme for NRG Player - free music player with equalizer, plays songs from folders and customizable user interface.


▶ Features

• Classic NRG control wheel
• Customizable color theme
• Album art on the main screen, widgets and lock-screen


▶ Installation

• Install NRG Player version 1.1.6d or greater
• Launch NRG Player Carbo Skin
• Tap “Launch NRG Player” button

or

• Open NRG Player Settings
• Open “Look and feel” screen
• Tap on “Skins” item and select “Carbo” skin
developer_address: 8A The Drive, Epsom, Auckland, New Zealand
